ED_Title: High-level meeting of the General Assembly to commemorate and promote the International Day against Nuclear Tests
ED_DecisionText: At its 112th plenary meeting, on 6 September 2018, the General Assembly decided, without setting a precedent, to invite Mr. Lassina Zerbo, Executive Secretary of the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty Organization, and Mr. Karipbek Kuyukov, Honorary Ambassador of the ATOM project, to make statements at the high-level meeting of the General Assembly to commemorate and promote the International Day against Nuclear Tests.
